text: Hey <@U068NTPJXMK>, self-promotion isn't permitted in this Slack, as per our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#unwanted-solicitation-of-services|code of conduct>.  I'll be deleting this post. Can you please post this in <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase>. but only if it's directly related to something you want HubSpot Developers to be aware of when developing on HubSpot, or something you've built on HubSpot?
